analysis.description:
BullTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#872-895) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#890-891)

Reentrancy in BullTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#872-895):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whitelist.isWhitelisted(beneficiary)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#873-874)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(toBeRefunded) (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#881-882)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#887-890)

	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/10/0x58fcf11196abaeefdf23198ec4ec9c5237963e17.sol#1): it allows old versions
